Hello, my name is Robert.

I am a Front-End Developer.

About me

Experienced in web development, using technologies such as React, Redux, NodeJS, ExpressJS, CSS with preprocessors such as SASS, and version control with Git. With a passion for programming and a penchant for learning, I am looking to further build my career in the software industry.
